nodes.text: The Story of Return of the Jedi
The Story of Return of the Jedi was the third in a series of three audio adaptations of the original Star Wars films, released on LP record album and cassette tape.
This album, released in 1983, told the abridged story of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi using audio from the film and narration by Chuck Riley. It was released by Buena Vista Records.
